zhnSysMon.name: zhnSysMon

revisions.description: Added zhnSysMonAlarmTypes: onBatteryPower2(33), batteryPowerLow2(34), replaceBattery2(35), batteryRemoved2(36), doorOpened(37)
Added zhnSysMonAlarmType varbind to the zhnSysMonAlarmSetEvent and zhnSysMonAlarmClearEvent NOTIFICATION-TYPEs.
Added new alarm types for CPEs with battery-backup units. Also added a new NOTIFICATION-TYPE for database configuration changes.
Change MODULE-IDENTITY to zhnSysMon and removed unsupported objects. Since this MIB has not yet been published, the unsupported objects were removed, rather than deprecated.
Added new alarm types for PW Clock Stability alarm
Added new alarm types for PW and T1/E1 interfaces
Changed Zhone OID to zhoneWtn OID
Added: - line power config table - SysMon ready and line power config update notifications - internal use use 'wanData' alarm severity

zhnSysMonAlarmTable, zhnSysMonAlarmSetEvent, zhnSysMonAlarmClearEvent: - Removed zhnSysMonAlarmInstance, added zhnSysMonAlarmInterfaceName zhnSysMonTestTable, zhnSysMonTestStartEvent, zhnSysMonTestStopEvent: - Removed zhnSysMonTestInstance, added zhnSysMonTestInterfaceName
- Added notification definitions, - Reworked Test Table, - Had to change MAX-ACCESS of objects included in notifications from not-accessible to read-create

zhnSysMon.organization: Zhone Technologies MIB Working Group Other information about group editing the MIB
zhnSysMon.contactinfo: Zhone Technologies, Inc. Florida Design Center 8545 126th Avenue North Largo, FL 33773 www.zhone.com General Comments to: largo-mibwg-team@zhone.com

zhnSysMonAlarmTable.name: zhnSysMonAlarmTable
zhnSysMonAlarmTable.description: This table contains the current system alarms.

zhnSysMonAlarmType.name: zhnSysMonAlarmType
zhnSysMonAlarmType.description: The type of alarm currently posted.

zhnSysMonAlarmInterfaceName.name: zhnSysMonAlarmInterfaceName
zhnSysMonAlarmInterfaceName.description: This object specifies the interface name (e.g., wlan0), or instance (e.g., sensor 1, primary power source 3) associated with the alarm.

zhnSysMonAlarmDescription.name: zhnSysMonAlarmDescription
zhnSysMonAlarmDescription.description: This object is a textual description of an alarm type.

zhnSysMonAlarmRowStatus.name: zhnSysMonAlarmRowStatus
zhnSysMonAlarmRowStatus.description: The SNMP RowStatus of the current row.

zhnSysMonTestTable.name: zhnSysMonTestTable
zhnSysMonTestTable.description: This table contains the current system tests.

zhnSysMonTestType.name: zhnSysMonTestType
zhnSysMonTestType.description: The type of test currently running.

zhnSysMonTestInterfaceName.name: zhnSysMonTestInterfaceName
zhnSysMonTestInterfaceName.description: This object specifies the interface name (e.g., wlan0) associated with the test.

zhnSysMonTestRowStatus.name: zhnSysMonTestRowStatus
zhnSysMonTestRowStatus.description: The SNMP RowStatus of the current row.

zhnSysMonTempSensorTable.name: zhnSysMonTempSensorTable
zhnSysMonTempSensorTable.description: This table contains the system temperature sensors.

zhnSysMonTempSensorId.name: zhnSysMonTempSensorId
zhnSysMonTempSensorId.description: This object specifies the reference index for each detected temperature sensor.

zhnSysMonTempSensorRowStatus.name: zhnSysMonTempSensorRowStatus
zhnSysMonTempSensorRowStatus.description: The SNMP RowStatus of the current row.

zhnSysMonTempSensorCurr.name: zhnSysMonTempSensorCurr
zhnSysMonTempSensorCurr.description: The current temperature reported by the sensor in degrees Celcius.

zhnSysMonTempSensorOS.name: zhnSysMonTempSensorOS
zhnSysMonTempSensorOS.description: The configured Overtemperature Shutdown (OS) for the sensor in degrees Celcius. This is the temperature alarm threshold

zhnSysMonTempSensorHyst.name: zhnSysMonTempSensorHyst
zhnSysMonTempSensorHyst.description: The configured temperature hysteresis for the sensor in degrees Celcius. This is the temperature at which the alarm condition goes away.

zhnSysMonTempSensorName.name: zhnSysMonTempSensorName
zhnSysMonTempSensorName.description: A textual string describing the sensor.

zhnSysMonLinePowerTable.name: zhnSysMonLinePowerTable
zhnSysMonLinePowerTable.description: This table contains the line power configuration.

zhnSysMonLinePowerLineNumber.name: zhnSysMonLinePowerLineNumber
zhnSysMonLinePowerLineNumber.description: This object specifies the line number for each primary power source.

zhnSysMonLinePowerStatus.name: zhnSysMonLinePowerStatus
zhnSysMonLinePowerStatus.description: The current power configuration status of the line identified by zhnSysMonLinePowerLineNumber. A status of enabled(1) indicates that the line is being monitored as a primary power source for the unit (i.e., an alarm is posted if it fails).

zhnSysMonLinePowerRowStatus.name: zhnSysMonLinePowerRowStatus
zhnSysMonLinePowerRowStatus.description: The SNMP RowStatus of the current row.

zhnSysMonAlarmSetEvent.name: zhnSysMonAlarmSetEvent
zhnSysMonAlarmSetEvent.description: A zhnSysMonAlarmSetEvent notification is sent when an alarm condition is detected by a system component. The System Monitor is informed of the alarm and generates the alarm set notification. The objects in the notification correspond to the values in a row instance of in the zhnSysMonAlarmTable.

zhnSysMonAlarmClearEvent.name: zhnSysMonAlarmClearEvent
zhnSysMonAlarmClearEvent.description: A zhnSysMonAlarmClearEvent notification is sent when an alarm condition is cleared by a system component. The System Monitor is informed of the alarm state and generates the alarm clear notification. The objects in the notification correspond to the values in a row instance of in the zhnSysMonAlarmTable.

zhnSysMonTestStartEvent.name: zhnSysMonTestStartEvent
zhnSysMonTestStartEvent.description: A zhnSysMonTestStartEvent notification is sent by any system component that begins a test. The objects in the notification correspond to the values in a row instance of in the zhnSysMonTestTable.

zhnSysMonTestStopEvent.name: zhnSysMonTestStopEvent
zhnSysMonTestStopEvent.description: A zhnSysMonTestStopEvent notification is sent by any system component that ends a test. The objects in the notification correspond to the values in a row instance of in the zhnSysMonTestTable.

zhnSysMonTempSensorCfgUpdateEvent.name: zhnSysMonTempSensorCfgUpdateEvent
zhnSysMonTempSensorCfgUpdateEvent.description: A zhnSysMonTempCfgUpdateEvent notification is sent by the System Monitor whenever it reconfigures a temperature sensor. The objects in the notification correspond to the values in a row instance of in the zhnSysMonTempSensorTable.

zhnSysMonLinePowerCfgUpdateEvent.name: zhnSysMonLinePowerCfgUpdateEvent
zhnSysMonLinePowerCfgUpdateEvent.description: A zhnSysMonLinePowerCfgUpdateEvent notification is sent by the System Monitor whenever it reconfigures a power source line. The objects in the notification correspond to the values in a row instance of in the zhnSysMonLinePowerTable.

zhnSysMonReadyEvent.name: zhnSysMonReadyEvent
zhnSysMonReadyEvent.description: A zhnSysMonReadyEvent notification is sent by the System Monitor whenever it has completed initialization and is ready to accept requests.

zhnSysMonConfigChangeEvent.name: zhnSysMonConfigChangeEvent
zhnSysMonConfigChangeEvent.description: A zhnSysMonConfigChangeEvent notification is generated whenever the persistent database is saved.
